parameters.name: Workspace
parameters.description: Select at least one workspace that contains continuous export data based on the selected subscriptions
parameters.query:
resources
| where type =~ 'microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces'
| order by name asc
| summarize Selected = makelist(id, 10), All = makelist(id, 1000)
| mvexpand All limit 100
| project value = tostring(All), label = tostring(All), selected = iff(Selected contains All, true, false)

content.json:
## Getting Started ### The Microsoft Sentinel: DoD Zero Trust Strategy Workbook Solution leverages Azure Policy, Azure Resource Graph, and Azure Log Analytics. This workbook provides an intuitive, customizable, framework intended to help track/report Zero Trust implementation in accordance with the latest DoD CIO Zero Trust Strategy (November 2022). In addition, curated resources, specfiic to Microsoft Zero Trust product/capabilitty alignment and implementation, are also provided. Please note that any references and example visualizations contained in this workbook are intended to ONLY serve as general guidance for meeting and/or exceeding the Target capabilities/activities by 2027. This solutions is meant to be a starting point and customizations are expected (and encouraged) to better suit the respective environment(s). ### ### [Recommended Microsoft Sentinel Roles](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/sentinel/roles) | Roles | Rights/Permissions | |:--|:--| |Security Reader | View Workbooks, Analytics, Hunting, Security Recommendations | |Security Contributor| Deploy/Modify Workbooks, Analytics, Hunting Queries, Apply Security Recommendations | |Automation Contributor| Deploy/Modify Playbooks & Automation Rules | |Owner| Assign Regulatory Compliance Initiatives| ### Onboarding Prerequisites 1Ô∏è‚É£ [Design Log Management Architecture](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-monitor/logs/design-logs-deployment)
2Ô∏è‚É£ [Onboard Microsoft Sentinel](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/sentinel/quickstart-onboard)
3Ô∏è‚É£ [Connect & Ingest Data Sources](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/sentinel/connect-data-sources)
4Ô∏è‚É£ [Extend Microsoft Sentinel Across Workspaces and Tenants](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/sentinel/extend-sentinel-across-workspaces-tenants)
5Ô∏è‚É£ [Configure 12 Months Hot Path Storage with Data Retention](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-monitor/logs/data-retention-archive)
6Ô∏è‚É£ [Configure 18 Months Cold Path Storage with Azure Data Explorer](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/sentinel/store-logs-in-azure-data-explorer) & [Configure Basic Logs](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-monitor/logs/basic-logs-configure)
### Print/Export Report 1Ô∏è‚É£ Set Background Theme: Settings > Appearance > Theme: Azure > Apply
2Ô∏è‚É£ Print/Export Report: More Content Actions (...) > Print Content
3Ô∏è‚É£ Settings: Layout (Landscape), Pages (All), Print (One Sided), Scale (60), Pages Per Sheet (1), Quality (1,200 DPI), Margins (None) > Print
### Disclaimer _This Solution demonstrates best practice guidance, but Microsoft does not guarantee nor imply compliance. All requirements, validations, and controls are governed by respective organizations. This solution provides visibility and situational awareness for security capabilities delivered with Microsoft technologies in predominantly cloud-based environments. Customer experience will vary by user and some panels may require additional configurations for operation. Recommendations do not imply coverage of respective controls as they are often one of several courses of action for approaching requirements which is unique to each customer. Recommendations should be considered a starting point for planning full or partial coverage of respective requirements._

# [DoD Zero Trust Strategy Workbook](https://dodcio.defense.gov/Portals/0/Documents/Library/DoD-ZTExecutionRoadmap.pdf) --- "The journey to Zero Trust requires all DoD Components to adopt and integrate Zero Trust capabilities, technologies, solutions, and processes across their architectures, systems, and within their budget and execution plans. Perhaps most importantly, they must also address Zero Trust requirements within their staffing, training, and professional development processes as well." For more information, see the [DoD CIO Zero Trust Strategy](https://dodcio.defense.gov/Portals/0/Documents/Library/DoD-ZTStrategy.pdf).

This workbook solution provides an intuitive, customizable, framework intended to help track/report Zero Trust implementation in accordance with the latest DoD Zero Trust Strategy (November 2022). It fully aligns with the DoD Zero Trust Strategy and also enables the following:
- Maturity Situational Awareness of the DoD Zero Trust Framework - Provides Configuration Guides, Examples, Resources, and Steps for Deployment - Enables actions and reporting on DoD Zero Trust Framework Pillars, Capabilities, and Activities

## Capability Requirements 1.1
| Descriptions        | Outcomes           | ZT Impact | 
|-|:--|:--|:--|:--|:-:|
| Regular and Privileged users are identified and integrated into an inventory supporting regular modifications. Applications, software and services that have local users are all part of the inventory and highlighted. | System owners have control (visibility and administrative rights) of all authorized and authenticated users on the network | Users not on the authorized user list will be denied access by policy |

## Capability Requirements 1.2
| Descriptions        | Outcomes           |  ZT Impact |  
|-|:--|:--|:--|:--|
| Through maturity levels Conditional Access works to create a dynamic level of access for users in the environment. This starts with traditional role-based access controls across a federate ICAM,expands to be application focused roles and ultimately utilizes enterprise attributes to provide dynamic access rules. | Eventually, organizations control user, device, and non-user entity DAAS access through dynamically changing user risk profiles and fine-grained access control to include the use of user risk assessments. | Users not known to the system and users who present an unacceptable degree of risk will be denied access with greater accuracy.

## Capability Requirements 1.3
| Descriptions        | Outcomes           | ZT Impact |
|-|:--|:--|:--|:--|:-:|
| This capability initially focuses on developing an organization focused MFA provider and Identity Provider to enable the centralization of users. Retirement of local and/or built-in accounts and groups is a critical piece to this capability. At the later maturity levels alternative and flexible MFA tokens can be used to provide access for standard and external users. | DoD organizations require users and non-user entities to authenticate using at least two of the following three attributes: knowledge (user ID/password), possession (CAC/token), or something you are (inherence, e.g., iris/fingerprints), in order to access DAAS. | Users not presenting multiple forms of authentication will be denied access to DAAS system and resources. |

## Capability Requirements 1.4
| Descriptions        | Outcomes           | ZT Impact |
|-|:--|:--|:--|:--|:-:|
| The capability focuses on removal of permanent administrator/elevated privileges by first creating a Privileged Account Management (PAM) system and migrating privileged users to it. The capability is then expanded upon by using automation with privilege escalation approvals and feeding analytics into the system for anomaly detection. | DoD organizations control, monitor, secure, and audit privileged identities (e.g., through password vaulting, JIT/JEA with PAWS) across their IT environments. | Critical assets and applications secured, controlled, monitored and managed through limits on admin access. |

## Capability Requirements 1.5
| Descriptions        | Outcomes           | ZT Impact | 
|-|:--|:--|:--|:--|:-:|
| The initial scope of this capability focuses on standardizing the Identity Lifecycle Management (ILM) processes and integrating with the standard organizational IDP/IDM solution. Once completed the capability shifts to establishing an Enterprise ILM process/solution either through a single solution or identity federation. | DoD organizations manually issue, manage, and revoke credentials bound to DoD person, device, and NPE identities. Identity information is developed and shared across entitles and trust domains providing ‚Äúsingle sign-on‚Äù convenience and efficiencies to identified (authenticated and authorized) users and devices. | Visibility and accuracy of user authentication information is increased, to include DoD users and users managed by other agencies. Users lacking sufficient credentials are denied access according to established policies. |

## Capability Requirements 1.8
| Descriptions        | Outcomes           | ZT Impact | 
|-|:--|:--|:--|:--|:-:|
| The DoD organizations and overall enterprise will methodically move towards continuous attribute based authentication. Initially the capability focuses on standardizing legacy single authentication to a organizationally approved IDP with users and groups. The second stages adds in based rule based (time) authentication and ultimately matures to Continuous Authentication based on the application/software activities and privileges requested. | DoD organizations continuously authenticate and authorize users' access to DAAS within and across sessions using MFA. | Users not continuously presenting multiple forms of authentication will be denied access to DAAS system and resources. |

## Capability Requirements 1.9
| Descriptions        | Outcomes           | ZT Impact | 
|-|:--|:--|:--|:--|:-:|
| DoD organizations and overall enterprise employ enterprise-level identity management and public key infrastructure (PKI) systems to track user, administrator and NPE identities across the network and ensure access is limited to only those who have the need and the right to know. Organizations can verify they need and have the right to access via credential management systems, identity governance and administration tools, and an access management tool. PKI systems can be federated but must either trust a central root certificate authority (CA) and/or cross-sign standardized organizational CA‚Äôs. | DoD organizations employ enterprise-level identity management systems to track user and NPE identities across the network and ensure access is limited to only those who have the need and the right to know; organizations can verify they need and have the right to access via credential management systems, identity governance and administration tools, and an access management tool. | Identities of users and NPE are centrally managed to ensure authorized and authenticated access to DAAS resources across platforms. |

üí° [Collect Azure Active Directory (Azure AD) Logs](https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/active-directory/reports-monitoring/howto-integrate-activity-logs-with-log-analytics#send-logs-to-azure-monitor)

## Example Visual Representations

content.query:
AuditLogs
| summarize Count=count() by OperationName, LoggedByService
| sort by Count asc  
| render piechart
content.title: Audit by Operation

content.query:
IdentityInfo | union BehaviorAnalytics
| where isnotempty(UserType)
| summarize count() by UserType
| render piechart
content.title: User Entity Behavior Analytics - IdentityInfo

content.query: IdentityDirectoryEvents | summarize count() by ActionType | render piechart
content.title: Microsoft Defender for Identity - IdentityLogonEvents
content.noDataMessage: MDI is not enabled or being sent to the workspace

content.query:
AzureActivity
| where Caller contains "@"
| summarize count() by Caller | render piechart
content.title: Azure Activity Count by Caller

content.query:
SigninLogs
| where TimeGenerated > ago(30d)
| project TimeGenerated, UserType, ResultType, AppDisplayName, UserPrincipalName
| where ResultType == 0
| summarize
    ['Total Member Signins']=countif(UserType == "Member"),
    ['Distinct Member Signins']=dcountif(UserPrincipalName, UserType == "Member"),
    ['Total Guest Signins']=countif(UserType == "Guest"),
    ['Distinct Guest Signins']=dcountif(UserPrincipalName, UserType == "Guest")
    by AppDisplayName
| sort by AppDisplayName asc
content.title: Successful Signins by Members vs Guests by App

items.name: Successful Signins by Members vs Guests by App

parameters.name: Activity
parameters.query:
SecurityEvent
| summarize Count = count() by Activity
| order by Count desc, Activity asc
| project Value = Activity, Label = strcat(Activity, ' - ', Count)

content.query:
let data = SecurityEvent
| where "{Activity:lable}" == "All" or Activity in ({Activity});
data
| summarize Count = count() by Activity
| join kind = fullouter (datatable(Activity:string)['Medium', 'high', 'low']) on Activity
| project Activity = iff(Activity == '', Activity1, Activity), Count = iff(Activity == '', 0, Count)
| join kind = inner (data
 | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by Activity)
 on Activity
| project-away Activity1, TimeGenerated
| extend Activitys = Activity
| union (
 data 
 | summarize Count = count() 
 | extend jkey = 1
 | join kind=inner (data
 | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain}
 | extend jkey = 1) on jkey
 | extend Activity = 'All', Activitys = '*' 
)
| order by Count desc
| take 10
content.title: User Inventory- Filtered by Top 10 Activities

content.query:
SigninLogs
| mv-expand ConditionalAccessPolicies
| extend CAResult = tostring(ConditionalAccessPolicies.result)
| project CAResult
| summarize count() by CAResult
content.title: Conditional Access 'SignIn' Summaries

content.query:
SigninLogs
| mv-expand ConditionalAccessPolicies
| extend CAResult = tostring(ConditionalAccessPolicies.result)
| where CAResult <> "success"
| summarize count() by AppDisplayName, CAResult
content.title: Non-Success ConditionalAccess by App

content.query:
SigninLogs
| mv-expand ConditionalAccessPolicies
| extend CAResult = tostring(ConditionalAccessPolicies.result)
| where RiskLevelDuringSignIn <> "none"
| summarize count() by RiskLevelDuringSignIn
| render piechart
content.title: ConditionalAccessPolicies SignIn Risk

content.query:
SigninLogs
//| where TimeGenerated > ago(30d)
| where ResultType == 0
| summarize Count=count() by AuthenticationRequirement
| render piechart
content.title: Single vs MultiFactor SignIns

content.query:
SigninLogs
| where AuthenticationRequirement == "multiFactorAuthentication"‚Äã
| mv-expand todynamic(AuthenticationDetails)‚Äã
| extend ['Authentication Method'] = tostring(AuthenticationDetails.authenticationMethod)
| where ['Authentication Method'] !in ("Password","Previously satisfied")‚Äã
| summarize Count=count()by ['Authentication Method']‚Äã
| where isnotempty(['Authentication Method'])
| sort by Count desc
| render piechart
content.title: Multifactor Authentication In Use

content.query:
SigninLogs
| where ResultType == "500121"
| mv-expand todynamic(AuthenticationDetails)
| project AuthenticationDetails, ResultType, UserPrincipalName
| extend ['MFA Failure Type'] = tostring(parse_json(AuthenticationDetails).authenticationStepResultDetail)
| where ['MFA Failure Type'] startswith "MFA denied"
//| summarize Count=count()by ['MFA Failure Type'], UserPrincipalName //uncomment to see upn
| summarize Count=count()by ['MFA Failure Type']
content.title: MFA Failure Type

content.query:
//Visualize password vs passwordless signins per day

//Data connector required for this query - Azure Active Directory - Signin Logs

SigninLogs
| mv-expand todynamic(AuthenticationDetails)
| project TimeGenerated, AuthenticationDetails
| extend AuthMethod = tostring(AuthenticationDetails.authenticationMethod)
| summarize
    Passwordless=countif(AuthMethod in ("Windows Hello for Business", "Passwordless phone sign-in", "FIDO2 security key", "X.509 Certificate")),
    Password=countif(AuthMethod == "Password")
    by bin(TimeGenerated, 1d)
| render barchart with (title="Passwordless vs Password Authentication", ytitle="Count")
content.title: Password vs Passwordless Auth

content.query:
SigninLogs
| where ResultType == 0
| summarize
    ['Total Signin Count']=count(),
    ['Total MFA Count']=countif(AuthenticationRequirement == "multiFactorAuthentication"),
    ['Total non MFA Count']=countif(AuthenticationRequirement == "singleFactorAuthentication")
    by AppDisplayName
| project
    AppDisplayName,
    ['Total Signin Count'],
    ['Total MFA Count'],
    ['Total non MFA Count'],
   MFAPercentage=(todouble(['Total MFA Count']) * 100 / todouble(['Total Signin Count']))
| sort by ['Total Signin Count'] desc, MFAPercentage asc
content.title: Total MFA Count by App

content.query:
union *
| where UserDisplayName == "On-Premises Directory Synchronization Service Account"
| extend Succession = tostring(parse_json(AuthenticationDetails)[0].succeeded)
| where Succession == 'true'
| project CreatedDateTime, UserPrincipalName, Succession
| summarize count() by UserPrincipalName, Succession
| render columnchart
content.title: Hybrid Identity - Syncing

content.query:
//verifying users are on prem synced by InitiatedBy an setting DirectorySync attribute.
AuditLogs
| extend OnPremSyncEnabled = tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(tostring(TargetResources[0].modifiedProperties))[0].newValue)))
| where OnPremSyncEnabled contains "DirectorySync"
| extend InitiatedBy = tostring(parse_json(tostring(InitiatedBy.user)).userPrincipalName)
//| project TimeGenerated, InitiatedBy, OnPremSync,
| extend UserPrincipalName = tostring(TargetResources[0].userPrincipalName)
| distinct InitiatedBy, UserPrincipalName, OnPremSyncEnabled
content.title: Audit Directory Synced Users

content.query:
//Detect when a new AAD App is added to an Azure AD application registration
AuditLogs
| where OperationName has "application"
| extend ApplicationName = tostring(TargetResources[0].displayName)
| extend ApplicationObjectId = tostring(TargetResources[0].id)
| distinct ApplicationName, ApplicationObjectId, OperationName
content.title: New Azure AD Application Registration

content.query:
AuditLogs
| where OperationName == "Add app role assignment grant to user"
| extend TargetApp = tostring(TargetResources[0].displayName)
| extend TargetUser = tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(tostring(TargetResources[0].modifiedProperties))[6].newValue)))
| distinct TargetApp, TargetUser, OperationName
content.title: App Role Assignment Added To User

items.name: App Role Assignment Added To User

content.query:
//Creates a list of your applications and summarizes successful signins by members vs guests separated to total and distinct signins
SigninLogs
| project TimeGenerated, UserType, ResultType, AppDisplayName, UserPrincipalName
| where ResultType == 0
| summarize
    ['Total Member Signins']=countif(UserType == "Member"),
    ['Distinct Member Signins']=dcountif(UserPrincipalName, UserType == "Member"),
    ['Total Guest Signins']=countif(UserType == "Guest"),
    ['Distinct Guest Signins']=dcountif(UserPrincipalName, UserType == "Guest")
    by AppDisplayName
| sort by AppDisplayName asc
content.title: List Applications and Summarizes

content.query:
//Detect when an Azure AD Entitlement Package is created. You may want to review to see what resources and roles have been included in the package.
AuditLogs
| where OperationName == "Create access package"
| where TargetResources[0].type == "AccessPackage"
| extend AccessPackageName = tostring(TargetResources[0].displayName)
| extend Actor = tostring(parse_json(tostring(InitiatedBy.user)).userPrincipalName)
| project OperationName, AccessPackageName, Actor
content.title: Azure AD Entitlement Package Creation

content.query:
AuditLogs
| where OperationName has "User requests access package assignment"
| extend InitiatedBy = tostring(parse_json(tostring(InitiatedBy.user)).userPrincipalName)
| extend AccessPackageID = tostring(TargetResources[2].id)
| distinct OperationName, InitiatedBy, AccessPackageID
content.title: Users Requesting Access via Entitlement Mgmt

## Example Visual Representations

parameters.name: Workload
parameters.query:
OfficeActivity
| summarize Count= count() by OfficeWorkload
| extend label = strcat(OfficeWorkload, " - ", Count)
| project OfficeWorkload, label

parameters.name: UserType
parameters.query:
OfficeActivity
| summarize Count= count() by UserType
| extend label = strcat(UserType, " - ", Count)
| project UserType, label

content.query:
let data = OfficeActivity
| where "*" in ({Workload}) or OfficeWorkload in ({Workload}) 
| where "*" in ({UserType}) or UserType in ({UserType});
let appData = data
| summarize TotalCount = count() by UserId
| join kind=inner (data
    | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on bin(TimeGenerated, 1d) in range({TimeRange:start}, {TimeRange:end}, {TimeRange:grain}) by UserId
    | project-away TimeGenerated) on UserId
| order by TotalCount desc, UserId asc
| project UserId, TotalCount, Trend
| serialize Id = row_number();
data
| summarize TotalCount = count() by Operation , UserId
| join kind=inner (data
    | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on bin(TimeGenerated, 1d) in range({TimeRange:start}, {TimeRange:end}, {TimeRange:grain}) by UserId, Operation
    | project-away TimeGenerated) on UserId, Operation
| order by TotalCount desc, UserId asc
| project UserId, Operation, TotalCount, Trend
| serialize Id = row_number(1000000)
| join kind=inner (appData) on UserId
| project Id, Name = Operation, Type = 'Operation', ['Operation Count'] = TotalCount, Trend, ParentId = Id1
| union (appData 
    | project Id, Name = UserId, Type = 'UserId', ['Operation Count'] = TotalCount, Trend )
| order by ['Operation Count'] desc, Name asc
content.title: User activities
Visualize Different Risk Types

content.query:
//Calculate the percentage of signins to all your Azure AD apps considered risky. Those requiring single factor authentication, coming from an unknown location and from an unknown device
SigninLogs
| where TimeGenerated > ago (30d)
| where ResultType == 0
| extend DeviceTrustType = tostring(DeviceDetail.trustType)
| summarize
    ['Total Signins']=count(),
    ['At Risk Signins']=countif(NetworkLocationDetails == '[]' and isempty(DeviceTrustType) and AuthenticationRequirement == "singleFactorAuthentication")
    by AppDisplayName
| extend ['At Risk Percentage']=(todouble(['At Risk Signins']) * 100 / todouble(['Total Signins']))
content.title: SignIns with AAD Apps Considered Risky

items.name: SignIns with AAD Apps Considered Risky

content.title: Service Principals At Risk

content.query:
BehaviorAnalytics
| where ActivityInsights.CountryUncommonlyConnectedFromInTenant == true
| where InvestigationPriority > 0
| project UserPrincipalName, SourceIPLocation, SourceIPAddress, ActionType
content.title: Country Uncommonly Connected

content.query:
BehaviorAnalytics
  | where ActivityInsights.UnusualNumberOfAADConditionalAccessFailures == "True"
  | extend UserPrincipalName = tolower(UserPrincipalName)
  | join kind=inner (
      union SigninLogs, AADNonInteractiveUserSignInLogs
      | where ConditionalAccessStatus == "failure"
      | mv-expand ConditionalAccessPolicies_dynamic
      | extend ConditionalAccessResult = parse_json(ConditionalAccessPolicies_dynamic.result)
      | extend ConditionalAccessName = parse_json(ConditionalAccessPolicies_dynamic.displayName)
      | extend ConditionalAccessId = parse_json(ConditionalAccessPolicies_dynamic.id)
      | extend ConditionalAccessEnforcedControl = parse_json(tostring(ConditionalAccessPolicies_dynamic.enforcedGrantControls))
      | extend SourceIPAddress = IPAddress
      | extend UserPrincipalName = tolower(UserPrincipalName)
      | where ConditionalAccessResult == "failure"
      | distinct CorrelationId, UserDisplayName, UserPrincipalName, SourceIPAddress, tostring(ConditionalAccessName), tostring(ConditionalAccessId), tostring(ConditionalAccessResult), tostring(ConditionalAccessEnforcedControl), ResultType, AADTenantId
  ) on UserPrincipalName, SourceIPAddress
  | summarize count() by ConditionalAccessName, ConditionalAccessId, ResultType, AADTenantId
  | join kind=inner (
      AuditLogs
      | where OperationName == "Update conditional access policy"
      | extend ConditionalAccessId = tostring(TargetResources[0].id)
  ) on ConditionalAccessId
  | extend Actor = parse_json(tostring(InitiatedBy.user)).userPrincipalName
  | project TimeGenerated, OperationName, Actor, ConditionalAccessName, CorrelationId, ResultType, count_
  | extend AccountCustomEntity = Actor
content.title: Unusual AAD Conditional Access Failures After Policy Change

items.name: Unusual AAD Conditional Access Failures After Policy Change

content.query:
let PrivRoles = dynamic(["Global Administrator", "Security Administrator", "Teams Administrator"]);
let identityinfo=
    IdentityInfo
    | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by AccountUPN
    | where AssignedRoles has_any (PrivRoles)
    | extend TargetUserName = AccountName
    | extend UserPrincipalName = AccountUPN
    | project TargetUserName, UserPrincipalName, AssignedRoles;
SecurityAlert
//| where TimeGenerated >= ago(90d)
| extend AlertTime = TimeGenerated
| extend UserPrincipalName = CompromisedEntity
| join kind=inner identityinfo on UserPrincipalName
| project AlertTime, TargetUserName, UserPrincipalName, AlertName, AssignedRoles
content.title: Alerts From Privileged Users

content.query:
//Detect when a group is added to Azure AD with the 'Azure AD roles can be assigned to this group' flag enabled

//Data connector required for this query - Azure Active Directory - Audit Logs

AuditLogs
//| where TimeGenerated > ago(90d)
| where OperationName == "Add group"
| where parse_json(tostring(TargetResources[0].modifiedProperties))[1].displayName == "IsAssignableToRole"
| where parse_json(tostring(parse_json(tostring(TargetResources[0].modifiedProperties))[1].newValue))[0] == true
| extend GroupName = tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(tostring(TargetResources[0].modifiedProperties))[0].newValue))[0])
| extend Actor = tostring(parse_json(tostring(InitiatedBy.user)).userPrincipalName)
| extend ['Actor IP Address'] = tostring(parse_json(tostring(InitiatedBy.user)).ipAddress)
| project TimeGenerated, OperationName, GroupName, Actor, ['Actor IP Address']
content.title: Detect New Privileged Group Added

content.query:
AuditLogs
//| where TimeGenerated >= ago(24h)
| extend SingleSignOnClaim = tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(tostring(TargetResources[0].modifiedProperties))[6].newValue))[0])
| extend ClaimValue = tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(tostring(TargetResources[0].modifiedProperties))[4].newValue))[0].ClaimValue)

content.query:
SigninLogs
| mv-expand ConditionalAccessPolicies
| extend CAResult = tostring(ConditionalAccessPolicies.result)
| where CAResult <> "success"
| summarize count() by AppDisplayName, CAResult
content.title: Non-Success ConditionalAccess by App

content.query:
AuditLogs
//| where TargetResources[0].userPrincipalName contains ""
//| where Identity == "Microsoft Invitation Acceptance Portal"
| where parse_json(tostring(parse_json(tostring(TargetResources[0].modifiedProperties))[4].newValue))[0] == "Accepted"
| extend User = tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(tostring(TargetResources[0].modifiedProperties))[0].newValue))[0])
| extend ConsentGrant = tostring(parse_json(tostring(TargetResources[0].modifiedProperties))[0].displayName)
| project User, ConsentGrant, Result
content.title: Consent Grant Accepted

content.query:
//Detect when a user flags a risky sign in within 8 hours of installing a service principal, could be a sign of OAuth consent phishing. This example uses 8 hours between events.
let threshold=8;
CloudAppEvents
| where ActionType == "Add service principal."
| where AccountType == "Regular"
| extend UserId = tostring(RawEventData.UserId)
| project
    ['Service Principal Install Time']=TimeGenerated,
    UserId,
    ['Service Principal Name']=ObjectName
| join kind=inner (
    AADUserRiskEvents
    | where DetectionTimingType == "realtime"
    | where RiskDetail !in ("aiConfirmedSigninSafe", "userPerformedSecuredPasswordReset")
    | project
        ['Risk Event Time']=TimeGenerated,
        UserId=UserPrincipalName,
        ['Risk Event IP']=IpAddress
    )
    on UserId
| extend ['Minutes Between Events']=datetime_diff("hour", ['Service Principal Install Time'], ['Risk Event Time'])
| where ['Minutes Between Events'] < threshold
| project
    UserId,
    ['Risk Event Time'],
    ['Service Principal Install Time'],
    ['Minutes Between Events'],
    ['Risk Event IP'],
    ['Service Principal Name']
content.title: Risky sign in within 8 hours of installing a service principal

items.name: Risky sign in within 8 hours of installing a service principal

content.query:
SecurityAlert
| where AlertName contains 'unsanctioned'
| extend CompromisedEntity = tostring(parse_json(CompromisedEntity))
| distinct CompromisedEntity, AlertName, AlertSeverity, AlertLink
content.title: Unscantioned Cloup Apps

content.query:
CloudAppEvents
//| extend Name_ = tostring(parse_json(tostring(RawEventData.ModifiedProperties))[0].Name)
| where AccountType == "Application"
| extend Target = tostring(parse_json(tostring(RawEventData.Target))[3].ID)
| extend Actor = tostring(parse_json(tostring(RawEventData.Actor))[0].ID)
| where isnotempty(Actor)
| project AccountType, ActionType, ActivityType, Application, Actor, Target
content.title: Cloud App Events by Application

content.query:
//Create a summary of PIM activations
AuditLogs
//| where TimeGenerated > ago (330d)
| where OperationName == "Add member to role completed (PIM activation)"
| extend User = tostring(parse_json(tostring(InitiatedBy.user)).userPrincipalName)
| extend Role = tostring(TargetResources[0].displayName)
| where isnotempty(User)
| project User, Role, TimeGenerated
| sort by TimeGenerated desc
content.title: Visualize Roles Activated by PIM

content.query:

| extend value_ = tostring(parse_json(AuthenticationProcessingDetails)[1].value)
| where value_ == 'True' or value_ == 'False'
| summarize count() by value_
| render piechart

content.query:
//Visualize password vs passwordless signins per week
SigninLogs
| project TimeGenerated, AuthenticationDetails
//| where TimeGenerated > ago (180d)
| mv-expand todynamic(AuthenticationDetails)
| extend AuthMethod = tostring(parse_json(AuthenticationDetails).authenticationMethod)
| where AuthMethod != "Previously satisfied"
| summarize
    Password=countif(AuthMethod == "Password"),
    Passwordless=countif(AuthMethod in ("FIDO2 security key", "Passwordless phone sign-in", "Windows Hello for Business", "Mobile app notification", "X.509 Certificate"))
    by startofweek(TimeGenerated)
| render timechart
    with (
    xtitle="Week",
    ytitle="Signin Count",
    title="Password vs Passwordless signins per week")
content.title: Password vs Passwordless SignIns Per Week

items.name: Password vs Passwordless SignIns Per Week

content.query:
//Passwordless Is Primary Auth
SigninLogs
| mv-expand todynamic(AuthenticationDetails)
| extend AuthMethod = tostring(parse_json(AuthenticationDetails).authenticationMethod)
| where AuthMethod != "Previously satisfied"
| extend authreq = tostring(AuthenticationDetails.authenticationStepRequirement)
//| where authreq contains "primary"
| where AuthMethod contains 'x.509'
    or AuthMethod contains 'Windows Hello for Business'
    or AuthMethod contains 'FIDO2'
    or AuthMethod contains 'mobile app notification'
    or AuthMethod contains 'passwordless phone sign-in'
| project TimeGenerated, UserPrincipalName, AuthMethod, authreq
| distinct UserPrincipalName, AuthMethod, authreq
content.title: Passwordless Is Primary Auth

content.query:
SigninLogs
//| where TimeGenerated > ago (30d)
| where UserType == 'Guest'
| where AuthenticationRequirement == "multiFactorAuthentication"
| extend ['MFA Method'] = tostring(parse_json(AuthenticationDetails)[1].authenticationMethod)
//| summarize Count=count()by ['MFA Method']
| where ['MFA Method'] != "Previously satisfied" and isnotempty(['MFA Method'])
| distinct TimeGenerated, UserPrincipalName, ['MFA Method']
content.title: Guest MFA Challenge Where Not Previously Satisifed

items.name: Guest MFA Challenge Where Not Previously Satisifed

content.query:
SigninLogs
| mv-expand todynamic(AuthenticationDetails)
| extend AuthMethod = tostring(parse_json(AuthenticationDetails).authenticationMethod)
| extend authreq = tostring(AuthenticationDetails.authenticationStepRequirement)
| where AuthMethod contains 'x.509' 
| where TokenIssuerType == "AzureAD"
| project TimeGenerated, UserPrincipalName, AuthMethod, TokenIssuerType, AppDisplayName, ConditionalAccessStatus
| sort by TimeGenerated desc
content.title: Azure AD - Certificate Based Auth

content.query:
DeviceInfo
| summarize arg_max(Timestamp, *) by DeviceId 
| where OnboardingStatus == "Can be onboarded"
| where isempty(MergedToDeviceId)
| project ['Time last seen']=Timestamp, DeviceName, DeviceId, OSDistribution, OSVersion, DeviceCategory, IsAzureADJoined, JoinType
content.title: Devices That Can Be Onboarded To Defender

items.name: Devices That Can Be Onboarded To Defender

content.query:
//Advanced Hunting query
//Data connector required for this query - Advanced Hunting license
DeviceLogonEvents
//| where Timestamp > ago(30d)
| project DeviceName, ActionType, LogonType, AdditionalFields, InitiatingProcessCommandLine, AccountName, IsLocalAdmin
| where ActionType == "LogonSuccess"
| where LogonType == "Interactive"
| where InitiatingProcessCommandLine == "lsass.exe"
| summarize
    ['Local Admin Count']=dcountif(AccountName,IsLocalAdmin == "true"),
    ['Local Admins']=make_set_if(AccountName, IsLocalAdmin == "true"), 
    ['Standard User Count']=dcountif(AccountName, IsLocalAdmin == "false"),
    ['Standard Users']=make_set_if(AccountName, IsLocalAdmin == "false")
    by DeviceName
| sort by ['Local Admin Count'] desc
content.title: Device Logon Event by User Type

items.name: Device Logon Event by User Type

content.query:
//Summarize attack surface reduction audit hits for each device
//Data connector required for this query - M365 Defender - Device* tables
DeviceEvents
//| where TimeGenerated > ago (1d)
| where ActionType startswith "Asr"
| extend isAudit = tostring(AdditionalFields.IsAudit)
| where isAudit = true
| project
    TimeGenerated,
    ActionType,
    DeviceName,
    FileName,
    InitiatingProcessAccountDomain,
    InitiatingProcessAccountName,
    InitiatingProcessCommandLine,
    InitiatingProcessParentFileName,
    ProcessTokenElevation
| summarize
    ['Total ASR audit hits']=count(),
    ['Distinct ASR audit rule hits']=dcount(ActionType),
    ['List of processes']=make_set(InitiatingProcessCommandLine)
    by DeviceName
| sort by ['Total ASR audit hits'] desc
content.title: Summarize Attack Surface Reduction Audit By Device

items.name: Summarize Attack Surface Reduction Audit By Device

content.title: Attack Surface Reduction Alerts By Device

items.name: Attack Surface Reduction Alerts By Device

content.query:
SecurityRecommendation
| where RecommendationName == "File integrity monitoring should be enabled on machines"
//| distinct RecommendationName, DeviceId
| extend id_ = tostring(parse_json(tostring(Properties.resourceDetails)).id)
| distinct Environment, RecommendationName, RecommendationState, id_
content.title: File Integrity Management By Environment

content.query:
DeviceEvents
    | where ActionType == "AntivirusScanCompleted"
    //| where Timestamp > ago(Timerange)
    | summarize LastSuccessfulAVScan = max(Timestamp) by DeviceName, DeviceId
    | join kind=innerunique (
        DeviceInfo
        | where isnotempty( OSVersion )
    ) on DeviceId
      | summarize LastSeen = arg_max(Timestamp,*) by DeviceName
    | project LastSeen, DeviceId, DeviceName, MachineGroup, OSPlatform, OSVersion, DeviceType, LastSuccessfulAVScan, JoinType
content.title: Device Event - Latest AV Scan

## Example Visual Representations

content.query:
let secured =
IntuneDeviceComplianceOrg
| where isnotempty(DeviceHealthThreatLevel)
| where DeviceHealthThreatLevel == "Secured"
| distinct DeviceName, UserName , DeviceHealthThreatLevel
| summarize count(DeviceName)
| extend ['Number of Devices'] = count_DeviceName
| extend Status = "Secured";
let notsecured =
IntuneDeviceComplianceOrg
| where isnotempty(DeviceHealthThreatLevel)
| where DeviceHealthThreatLevel == "Not Secured"
| distinct  DeviceName, UserName , DeviceHealthThreatLevel
| summarize count(DeviceName)
| extend ['Number of Devices'] = count_DeviceName
| extend Status = "Not Secured";
let unknown =
IntuneDeviceComplianceOrg
| where isnotempty(DeviceHealthThreatLevel)
| where DeviceHealthThreatLevel == "Unknown"
| distinct  DeviceName, UserName , DeviceHealthThreatLevel
| summarize count(DeviceName)
| extend ['Number of Devices'] = count_DeviceName
| extend Status = "Unknown";
secured
| union notsecured, unknown
| project Status, ['Number of Devices']
| sort by ['Number of Devices']
content.title: Number Of Devices With DeviceHealthThreatLevel Status

items.name: Number Of Devices With DeviceHealthThreatLevel Status

content.query:
// Compare OS Version changes between yesterday and today. It will calculate the difference (number of devices) between two days.
let Yesterday=
IntuneDevices
| where TimeGenerated < ago(1d) 
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by DeviceName
| where todatetime(LastContact) > ago(30d) 
| summarize count() by OSVersion
| sort by OSVersion desc
| extend CustomName = OSVersion
| extend Version_Yesterday = count_;
let Today=
IntuneDevices 
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by DeviceName
| where todatetime(LastContact) > ago(30d) 
| summarize count() by OSVersion
| sort by OSVersion desc
| extend CustomName = OSVersion
| extend Version_Today = count_;
Yesterday
| join kind=inner Today on OSVersion
| project CustomName, Version_Today, Version_Yesterday, Difference = Version_Today-Version_Yesterday
| sort by CustomName desc
content.title: Compare OS Version Changes Between Yesterday & Today

items.name: Compare OS Version Changes Between Yesterday & Today

content.title: Visualize When Devices Last Contacted Intune

items.name: Visualize When Devices Last Contacted Intune

content.query:
securityresources
| where type == "microsoft.security/assessments"
| where name == "c68a8c2a-6ed4-454b-9e37-4b7654f2165f" 
     or name == "4e07c7d0-e06c-47d7-a4a9-8c7b748d1b27" 
     or name == "822425e3-827f-4f35-bc33-33749257f851"
     or name == "2ebc815f-7bc7-4573-994d-e1cc46fb4a35" 
     or name == "6672df26-ff2e-4282-83c3-e2f20571bd11"
     or name == "1a600c61-6443-4ab4-bd28-7a6b6fb4691d" 
     or name == "92643c1f-1a95-4b68-bbd2-5117f92d6e35"
| extend Status = tostring(properties.status.code)
| where Status == 'Unhealthy'
| project assessmentKey=name, parse_json(properties)
| where properties.metadata.severity in ('Low','Medium','High')
| extend SeverityRank = case(
    properties.metadata.severity == 'High', 3,
    properties.metadata.severity == 'Medium', 2,
    properties.metadata.severity == 'Low', 1,
    0)
| project-away SeverityRank
| extend Severity = properties.metadata.severity
| project Severity = tostring(Severity)
| summarize Count = count() by Severity
content.title: Dynamic Security testing posture by severity

content.query:
securityresources
| where type == "microsoft.security/assessments"
| extend assessmentKey = extract(".*assessments/(.+?)/.*",1,  id)
| extend Repository = tostring(split(properties.resourceDetails.Id,"/",12))
| extend Status = tostring(properties.status.code)
| extend TimeGenerated = todatetime(properties.timeGenerated)
| where Status == 'Unhealthy'
| where name == "c68a8c2a-6ed4-454b-9e37-4b7654f2165f" 
     or name == "4e07c7d0-e06c-47d7-a4a9-8c7b748d1b27" 
     or name == "822425e3-827f-4f35-bc33-33749257f851"
     or name == "2ebc815f-7bc7-4573-994d-e1cc46fb4a35" 
     or name == "6672df26-ff2e-4282-83c3-e2f20571bd11"
     or name == "1a600c61-6443-4ab4-bd28-7a6b6fb4691d" 
     or name == "92643c1f-1a95-4b68-bbd2-5117f92d6e35"
| summarize count(name) by trim(@'^\["|"]$',Repository)
content.title: Posture Assessment By Repository

content.query:
securityresources
| where type == "microsoft.security/assessments"
| where name == "1a600c61-6443-4ab4-bd28-7a6b6fb4691d" or name == "6672df26-ff2e-4282-83c3-e2f20571bd11" or name == "92643c1f-1a95-4b68-bbd2-5117f92d6e35" or name == "c68a8c2a-6ed4-454b-9e37-4b7654f2165f" or name == "580dbad4-33c2-44c8-a37d-22874d8ef4c3" or name == "0db7ca3c-bd65-4244-9be3-2194c13a3893" or name == "822425e3-827f-4f35-bc33-33749257f851" or name == "4e07c7d0-e06c-47d7-a4a9-8c7b748d1b27" or name == "92643c1f-1a95-4b68-bbd2-5117f92d6e35"
| extend Status = tostring(properties.status.code)
| where Status == 'Unhealthy'
| extend Repository = tostring(split(id, '/')[12]), 
        Threats = tostring(strcat_array(properties.metadata.threats,",")), 
        Tactics = tostring(strcat_array(properties.metadata.tactics,",")), 
        Techniques = tostring(strcat_array(properties.metadata.techniques,",")),
        Details = "info"
| project Repository, Threats, Tactics, Techniques, properties, Details
content.title: Threats & Tactics

content.query:
let FailedAssets=SecurityBaseline
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by _ResourceId, Description
| where Description contains "config"
| where AnalyzeResult == "Failed"
| summarize FailedAssets = makelist(Computer) by Description;
let PassedAssets=SecurityBaseline
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by _ResourceId, Description
| where Description contains "config"
| where AnalyzeResult == "Passed"
| summarize PassedAssets = makelist(Computer) by Description;
SecurityBaseline
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by _ResourceId, Description
| where Description contains "config"
| summarize
    Failed‚ÄØ=‚ÄØcountif(AnalyzeResult == "Failed"),
    Passed‚ÄØ=‚ÄØcountif(AnalyzeResult == "Passed"),
    Total‚ÄØ=‚ÄØcountif(AnalyzeResult == "Failed" or AnalyzeResult == "Passed")
    by Description
| extend PassedControls‚ÄØ= (Passed / todouble(Total)) * 100
| join kind=fullouter(FailedAssets) on Description
| join kind=fullouter(PassedAssets) on Description
| project Description, Total, PassedControls, Passed, Failed, PassedAssets, FailedAssets
| sort by Total, Passed desc
| limit 250
content.title: Review Security Appllication Authorization Baselines

content.query:
OfficeActivity
| where "*" in ({Workload}) or OfficeWorkload in ({Workload}) 
| where "*" in ({UserType}) or UserType in ({UserType})

content.title: Data Catalog Update, create, add, and delete activities

content.query:
let Logs = InformationProtectionLogs_CL | extend LabelName_s = columnifexists("LabelName_s",""), LabelId_g = columnifexists("LabelId_g",""), ObjectId_s = columnifexists("ObjectId_s",""), Activity_s = columnifexists("Activity_s","");
Logs
| where isnotempty(LabelId_g)
| where isnotempty(ObjectId_s)
| where Activity_s in ("NewLabel", "UpgradeLabel", "DowngradeLabel", "RemoveProtection", "NewProtection", "ChangeProtection")
| summarize value=count() by LabelName_s
| order by value
content.title: Labels

content.query:
let Logs = InformationProtectionLogs_CL | extend ApplicationName_s = columnifexists("ApplicationName_s",""), LabelId_g = columnifexists("LabelId_g",""), ObjectId_s = columnifexists("ObjectId_s",""), Activity_s = columnifexists("Activity_s","");
Logs
| where isnotempty(LabelId_g)
| where isnotempty(ObjectId_s)
| where Activity_s in ("NewLabel", "UpgradeLabel", "DowngradeLabel", "RemoveProtection", "NewProtection", "ChangeProtection")
| summarize value=count() by ApplicationName_s
| order by value
content.title: Labels by application

content.json: ## Security Incidents: Sensitive Data

content.query:
SecurityIncident
| extend Tactics = tostring(parse_json(tostring(AdditionalData.tactics)))
| where Title contains "data" or Title contains "access" or Title contains "sensitive" or Tactics == "exfiltration"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by IncidentNumber
| parse IncidentUrl with * 'https://portal.azure.com/#asset/Microsoft_Azure_Security_Insights/Incident' IncidentBlade
| extend SeverityRank=iff(Severity == "High", 3, iff(Severity == "Medium", 2, iff(Severity == "Low", 1, iff(Severity == "Informational", 0, 0))))
| sort by SeverityRank, TimeGenerated desc
| project ['Incident Name']=Title, IncidentNumber, Severity, IncidentUrl, FirstActivityTime, IncidentBlade
| limit 250
content.noDataMessage: No Incidents Observed For This Technique Within These Thresholds

content.query:
SecurityIncident
| extend Tactics = tostring(parse_json(tostring(AdditionalData.tactics)))
| where Description contains "data" or Title contains "data" or Description contains "loss" or Title contains "loss" or Description contains "exfil" or Title contains "exfil" or Tactics contains "exfil"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by IncidentNumber
| parse IncidentUrl with * '/#asset/Microsoft_Azure_Security_Insights/Incident' IncidentBlade
| extend SeverityRank=iff(Severity == "High", 3, iff(Severity == "Medium", 2, iff(Severity == "Low", 1, iff(Severity == "Informational", 0, 0))))
| sort by SeverityRank, TimeGenerated desc
| project ['Incident Name']=Title, IncidentNumber, Severity, IncidentUrl, FirstActivityTime, IncidentBlade
| limit 250
content.title: Data Loss & Preventtion Security Incidents
content.noDataMessage: No Incidents Observed For This Technique Within These Thresholds

parameters.name: TimeRange
parameters.description: Select the time range that will be used for the query's

content.query:
SigninLogs
| where ResultType == 0 and AppDisplayName != ""
| summarize count() by AppDisplayName
| join (
SigninLogs
| make-series TrendList = count() on TimeGenerated in range({TimeRange:start}, {TimeRange:end}, 4h) by AppDisplayName 
) on AppDisplayName
| top 10 by count_ desc
content.title: Successful Loggins By Application

content.query:
SigninLogs
| extend ResultText = case(isnotempty(ResultDescription), ResultDescription, ResultType == 0 and isempty(ResultDescription), "successful login", "unknown") // Create readable result text to include succesfull logins
| summarize dcount(CorrelationId) by ResultText // Signin results by unique CorrelationId
| render piechart
content.title: Login events by result

content.query:
SigninLogs
| extend ResultText = case(isnotempty(ResultDescription), ResultDescription, ResultType == 0 and isempty(ResultDescription), "successful login", "unknown")
| summarize dcount(CorrelationId) by ResultText, bin(TimeGenerated,4h) // summarize the total Signin events per Description per hour (by unique CorrelationId's)
content.title: Count of login types per 4 hours

content.query:
SigninLogs
| where isnotempty(LocationDetails['countryOrRegion']) and ResultType == 0// Where location details are available and login is successful
| extend city = tostring(LocationDetails['city'])
| summarize count() by city, Location // Summarize by city name
| join (
SigninLogs
| extend city = tostring(LocationDetails['city'])
| make-series TrendList = count() on TimeGenerated in range({TimeRange:start}, {TimeRange:end}, {TimeRange:grain}) by city 
) on city
| project Location, city, ["Total events"] = count_, TrendLine = TrendList
| top 10 by ["Total events"] desc
content.title: successful login locations

content.query:
securityresources
| where type =~ "microsoft.security/assessments" and properties.status.code =~ "Unhealthy"
| extend firstEvaluationDate = todatetime(properties.status.firstEvaluationDate), statusChangeDate = todatetime(properties.status.statusChangeDate), severityFilter = tostring("high, medium, low"), severity = tostring(properties.metadata.severity), environmentFilter = tostring("azure, aws, gcp")
| project subscriptionId, resourceGroup,
    resourceId = properties.resourceDetails.Id,
    source = tostring(properties.resourceDetails.Source),
    displayName = properties.displayName, 
    statusCode = properties.status.code,
    severity, severityFilter, environmentFilter,
    statusChangeDate, firstEvaluationDate,
    overduePeriod = datetime_diff("day", now(), statusChangeDate)
| where severityFilter has severity and environmentFilter has source
| where displayName contains 'network'
content.title: Defender for Cloud Network Traffic Recommendations

content.query:
resources
| where type contains "gate" or type contains "bastion" or type contains "route" or type contains "privateend"
| project id,type,location,resourceGroup
| order by location asc

content.query:
let data = AWSCloudTrail;
data
| summarize Count = count() by AWSRegion
| join kind = fullouter (datatable(AWSRegion:string)['OneDrive', 'SharePoint']) on AWSRegion
| project AWSRegion = iff(AWSRegion == '', AWSRegion1, AWSRegion), Count = iff(AWSRegion == '', 0, Count)
| join kind = inner (data
    | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by AWSRegion)
    on AWSRegion
| project-away AWSRegion1, TimeGenerated
| extend AWSRegion = AWSRegion
| union (
    data 
    | summarize Count = count() 
    | extend jkey = 1
    | join kind=inner (data
        | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain}
        | extend jkey = 1) on jkey
    | extend AWSRegion = 'All', AWSRegions = '*'    
)
| order by Count desc
| take 10
content.title: Top 10 active regions - click to filter

content.query:
AWSCloudTrail

content.json: ## Example Visual Representations
## Azure AD audit logs

parameters.name: User
parameters.query:
AuditLogs
| where SourceSystem == "Azure AD"
| extend initiator = iif (tostring(InitiatedBy.user.userPrincipalName) != "", tostring(InitiatedBy.user.userPrincipalName), "unknown")
//| where initiator!= ""
| summarize Count = count() by initiator
| order by Count desc, initiator asc
| project Value = initiator, Label = strcat(initiator, ' - ', Count), Selected = false

parameters.name: Category
parameters.query:
AuditLogs
| extend initiator = iif (tostring(InitiatedBy.user.userPrincipalName) != "", tostring(InitiatedBy.user.userPrincipalName), "unknown")
| where "{User:lable}" == "All" or initiator in ({User})
| summarize Count = count() by Category
| order by Count desc, Category asc
| project Value = Category, Label = strcat(Category, ' - ', Count)

parameters.name: Result
parameters.query:
AuditLogs
| extend initiator = iif (tostring(InitiatedBy.user.userPrincipalName) != "", tostring(InitiatedBy.user.userPrincipalName), "unknown")
| where "{User:lable}" == "All" or initiator in ({User})
| summarize Count = count() by Result
| order by Count desc, Result asc
| project Value = Result, Label = strcat(Result, ' - ', Count, ' sign-ins')

content.query:
let data = AuditLogs
| where "{Category:lable}" == "All" or Category in ({Category})
| where "{Result:lable}" == "All" or Result in ({Result})
| extend initiatingUserPrincipalName = tostring(InitiatedBy.user.userPrincipalName)
| where initiatingUserPrincipalName != "" 
| where "{User:lable}" == "All" or initiatingUserPrincipalName in ({User});
data
| summarize Count = count() by Category
| join kind = fullouter (datatable(Category:string)['Medium', 'high', 'low']) on Category
| project Category = iff(Category == '', Category1, Category), Count = iff(Category == '', 0, Count)
| join kind = inner (data
    | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by Category)
    on Category
| project-away Category1, TimeGenerated
| extend Category = Category
| union (
    data 
    | summarize Count = count() 
    | extend jkey = 1
    | join kind=inner (data
        | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain}
        | extend jkey = 1) on jkey
    | extend Category = 'All', Categorys = '*'    
)
| order by Count desc
| take 10
content.title: Access Categories

content.query:
let data = AuditLogs
| where "{Result:lable}" == "All" or Result in ({Result})
| extend initiator = iif (tostring(InitiatedBy.user.userPrincipalName) != "", tostring(InitiatedBy.user.userPrincipalName), "unknown")
| where "{User:lable}" == "All" or initiator in ({User})
| where "{Category:lable}" == "All" or Category in ({Category})
| where Category == '{CategoryFIlter}' or '{CategoryFIlter}' == "All";
let appData = data
| summarize TotalCount = count() by OperationName, Category
| join kind=inner (data
    | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated in range({TimeRange:start}, {TimeRange:end}, {TimeRange:grain}) by OperationName
    | project-away TimeGenerated) on OperationName
| order by TotalCount desc, OperationName asc
| project OperationName, TotalCount, Trend, Category
| serialize Id = row_number();
data
| summarize TotalCount = count() by initiator = iif (tostring(InitiatedBy.user.userPrincipalName) != "", tostring(InitiatedBy.user.userPrincipalName), "unknown"), Category, OperationName
| join kind=inner (data
    | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated in range({TimeRange:start}, {TimeRange:end}, {TimeRange:grain}) by OperationName, initiator = iif (tostring(InitiatedBy.user.userPrincipalName) != "", tostring(InitiatedBy.user.userPrincipalName), "unknown")
    | project-away TimeGenerated) on OperationName, initiator
| order by TotalCount desc, OperationName asc
| project OperationName, initiator, TotalCount, Category, Trend
| serialize Id = row_number(1000000)
| join kind=inner (appData) on OperationName
| project Id, Name = initiator, Type = 'initiator', ['Operations Count'] = TotalCount, Trend, Category, ParentId = Id1
| union (appData 
    | project Id, Name = OperationName, Type = 'Operation', ['Operations Count'] = TotalCount, Category, Trend)
| order by ['Operations Count'] desc, Name asc
content.title: Conditional Acess & User activities

parameters.name: Activity
parameters.query:
SecurityEvent
| summarize Count = count() by Activity
| order by Count desc, Activity asc
| project Value = Activity, Label = strcat(Activity, ' - ', Count)

content.query:
let data = SecurityEvent
| where "{Activity:lable}" == "All" or Activity in ({Activity});
data
| summarize Count = count() by Activity
| join kind = fullouter (datatable(Activity:string)['Medium', 'high', 'low']) on Activity
| project Activity = iff(Activity == '', Activity1, Activity), Count = iff(Activity == '', 0, Count)
| join kind = inner (data
 | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by Activity)
 on Activity
| project-away Activity1, TimeGenerated
| extend Activitys = Activity
| union (
 data 
 | summarize Count = count() 
 | extend jkey = 1
 | join kind=inner (data
 | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain}
 | extend jkey = 1) on jkey
 | extend Activity = 'All', Activitys = '*' 
)
| order by Count desc
| take 10
content.title: Top 10 Identity & Access Activities - click to filter by activity

content.query:
let data = SecurityEvent
| where "{Activity:lable}" == "All" or Activity in ({Activity})
| where Activity == '{ActivityPiker}' or '{ActivityPiker}' == "All" and AccountType == 'User'
| extend Name = extract(@'^(.*\\)?([^@]*)(@.*)?$', 2, tolower(Account));
let appData = data
| summarize TotalCount = count() by Name
| join kind=inner (data
    | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated in range({TimeRange:start}, {TimeRange:end}, {TimeRange:grain}) by Name
    | project-away TimeGenerated) on Name
| order by TotalCount desc, Name asc
| project Name, TotalCount, Trend
| serialize Id = row_number();
data
| summarize TotalCount = count() by Activity , Name
| join kind=inner (data
    | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated in range({TimeRange:start}, {TimeRange:end}, {TimeRange:grain}) by Name, Activity
    | project-away TimeGenerated) on Name, Activity
| order by TotalCount desc, Name asc
| project Name, Activity, TotalCount, Trend
| serialize Id = row_number(1000000)
| join kind=inner (appData) on Name
| project Id, Name = Activity, Type = 'Activity', ['Activity Count'] = TotalCount, Trend, ParentId = Id1
| union (appData 
    | project Id, Name = Name, Type = 'Computer', ['Activity Count'] = TotalCount, Trend )
| order by ['Activity Count'] desc, Name asc
content.title: User activities

content.query:
//let Users = dynamic({Userinfo});
let data = SecurityEvent
| where "{Activity:lable}" == "All" or Activity in ({Activity})
| where Activity == '{ActivityPiker}' or '{ActivityPiker}' == "All" and AccountType == 'Machine'
| extend user = extract(@'^(.*\\)?([^@]*)(@.*)?$', 2, tolower(Account))
| where dynamic({Userinfo}).Type == '*' or (dynamic({Userinfo}).Type == 'Computer' and user == dynamic({Userinfo}).Name);
let appData = data
| summarize TotalCount = count() by Computer
| join kind=inner (data
    | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated in range({TimeRange:start}, {TimeRange:end}, {TimeRange:grain}) by Computer
    | project-away TimeGenerated) on Computer
| order by TotalCount desc, Computer asc
| project Computer, TotalCount, Trend
| serialize Id = row_number();
data
| summarize TotalCount = count() by Activity , Computer
| join kind=inner (data
    | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated in range({TimeRange:start}, {TimeRange:end}, {TimeRange:grain}) by Computer, Activity
    | project-away TimeGenerated) on Computer, Activity
| order by TotalCount desc, Computer asc
| project Computer, Activity, TotalCount, Trend
| serialize Id = row_number(1000000)
| join kind=inner (appData) on Computer
| project Id, Name = Activity, Type = 'Activity', ['Activity Count'] = TotalCount, Trend, ParentId = Id1
| union (appData 
    | project Id, Name = Computer, Type = 'Computer', ['Activity Count'] = TotalCount, Trend )
| order by ['Activity Count'] desc, Name asc
content.title: Machine activities

| where RiskLevelDuringSignIn <> "none"
| summarize count() by RiskLevelDuringSignIn
| render piechart

content.query:
let FailedAssets=SecurityBaseline
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by _ResourceId, Description
| where Description contains "authentication" or Description contains "password"
| where AnalyzeResult == "Failed"
| summarize FailedAssets = makelist(Computer) by Description;
let PassedAssets=SecurityBaseline
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by _ResourceId, Description
| where Description contains "authentication" or Description contains "password"
| where AnalyzeResult == "Passed"
| summarize PassedAssets = makelist(Computer) by Description;
SecurityBaseline
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by _ResourceId, Description
| where Description contains "authentication" or Description contains "password"
| summarize
    Failed‚ÄØ=‚ÄØcountif(AnalyzeResult == "Failed"),
    Passed‚ÄØ=‚ÄØcountif(AnalyzeResult == "Passed"),
    Total‚ÄØ=‚ÄØcountif(AnalyzeResult == "Failed" or AnalyzeResult == "Passed")
    by Description
| extend PassedControls‚ÄØ= (Passed / todouble(Total)) * 100
| join kind=fullouter(FailedAssets) on Description
| join kind=fullouter(PassedAssets) on Description
| project Description, Total, PassedControls, Passed, Failed, PassedAssets, FailedAssets
| sort by Total, Passed desc
| limit 250
content.title: Review Automated Security Baselines

parameters.name: AlertSeverity
parameters.query:
SecurityAlert
| summarize Count = count() by AlertSeverity
| order by Count desc, AlertSeverity asc
| project Value = AlertSeverity, Label = strcat(AlertSeverity, ' - ', Count)

parameters.name: ProductName
parameters.query:
SecurityAlert
| summarize Count = count() by ProductName
| order by Count desc, ProductName asc
| project Value = ProductName, Label = strcat(ProductName, ' - ', Count)

content.query:
let data = SecurityAlert
| where "{AlertSeverity:lable}" == "All" or AlertSeverity in ({AlertSeverity})
| where "{ProductName:lable}" == "All" or ProductName in ({ProductName});
data
| summarize Count = count() by AlertSeverity
| join kind = inner (data
 | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by AlertSeverity)
 on AlertSeverity
 | project-away TimeGenerated
| extend AlertSeveritys = AlertSeverity
| union (
 data 
 | summarize Count = count() 
 | extend jkey = 1
 | join kind=inner (data
 | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain}
 | extend jkey = 1) on jkey
 | extend AlertSeverity = 'All', AlertSeveritys = '*' 
)
| extend Severity = iif(AlertSeverity == "All", 0,iif(AlertSeverity == "High", 1, iif(AlertSeverity == "Medium", 2, iif(AlertSeverity == "Low", 3, 4))))
| order by Severity asc
content.title: Machine Learning Security Alerts by Severity

parameters.name: TimeRange
parameters.description: Select the time range that will be used for the query's

content.query:
SigninLogs
| extend ResultText = case(isnotempty(ResultDescription), ResultDescription, ResultType == 0 and isempty(ResultDescription), "successful login", "unknown") // Create readable result text to include succesfull logins
| summarize dcount(CorrelationId) by ResultText // Signin results by unique CorrelationId
| render piechart
content.title: Login events by result

content.query:
SigninLogs
| extend ResultText = case(isnotempty(ResultDescription), ResultDescription, ResultType == 0 and isempty(ResultDescription), "successful login", "unknown")
| summarize dcount(CorrelationId) by ResultText, bin(TimeGenerated,4h) // summarize the total Signin events per Description per hour (by unique CorrelationId's)
content.title: Count of login types per 4 hours

content.query:
SigninLogs
| where isnotempty(LocationDetails['countryOrRegion']) and ResultType == 0// Where location details are available and login is successful
| extend city = tostring(LocationDetails['city'])
| summarize count() by city, Location // Summarize by city name
| join (
SigninLogs
| extend city = tostring(LocationDetails['city'])
| make-series TrendList = count() on TimeGenerated in range({TimeRange:start}, {TimeRange:end}, {TimeRange:grain}) by city 
) on city
| project Location, city, ["Total events"] = count_, TrendLine = TrendList
| top 10 by ["Total events"] desc
content.title: successful login locations

content.query:
SigninLogs
| where ResultType == 0 and AppDisplayName != ""
| summarize count() by AppDisplayName
| join (
SigninLogs
| make-series TrendList = count() on TimeGenerated in range({TimeRange:start}, {TimeRange:end}, 4h) by AppDisplayName 
) on AppDisplayName
| top 10 by count_ desc
content.title: successful logins by application

content.json:
---- ## AuditLogs These tables are an example Azure Security Administrators and Zero Trust Implementtors can use so to make sure that the Zero Trust Logging activties of user operations are successfully executed.
It also benefits the security operator by seeing which operations are perfomed by which users or services. Therefore he or she can act quickly on a suspicious operation.

content.query:
AuditLogs
| summarize Runs = count(), Success = countif(Result == 'success'), Fails = countif(Result != 'success') by OperationName // Summarize the total, successful and failed operations by name
| extend SuccessRate = (Success * 100 / Runs) // Calculate the percentage of succesful operations against the total
| join (
AuditLogs
| where Result == 'success'
| make-series TrendList = count() on TimeGenerated in range({TimeRange:start}, {TimeRange:end}, {TimeRange:grain}) by OperationName 
) on OperationName
| project OperationName, Runs, SuccessRate, TrendList
| top 10 by Runs desc // Show the top 10 of most run operations
content.title: Top 10 operation by successrate

content.query:
AuditLogs
| summarize Runs = count(), Success = countif(Result == 'success'), Fails = countif(Result != 'success') by OperationName // Summarize the total, successful and failed operations by name
| extend SuccessRate = (Success * 100 / Runs) // Calculate the percentage of succesful operations against the total
| project OperationName, Runs, SuccessRate, Fails
| top 10 by SuccessRate asc // Show the 10 Operation by least SuccessRate
content.title: Top 10 most failed operations

# 7.4 User and Entity Behavior Analytics ## Microsoft Portals Department of Defense üîÄ [Entra ID](https://portal.azure.us/#view/Microsoft_AAD_Devices/DevicesMenuBlade/~/Devices/menuId~/null)
üîÄ [Sentinel](https://portal.azure.us/#blade/HubsExtension/BrowseResourceBlade/resourceType/microsoft.securityinsightsarg%2Fsentinell)
üîÄ [Defender For Cloud](https://portal.azure.us/#blade/Microsoft_Azure_Security/SecurityMenuBlade)
